channel.title: Incompetence
channel.description:
Well, about 2 weeks ago I sent my 22" inch computer monitor to service because it suddenly bursted into flames and started smoking the shit out of my room.
I went to the shop where I bought it and got told that they would have it ready in about 3-5 days.
I wait 2 weeks and I'm getting no calls from the store, so I went over there to rant. Those retards had forgot to send it to service.
I went back in about 4 days and they gave me a new one. I was satisfied.
When I got home I opened the box, and guess what, no cables.
I went back there, yet again and I got another box which contained the VGA cable and the power cable, this time they had forgot to put in the audio cable.
I was really pissed and went back. After waiting 30 minutes, the retard finally comes out from the back and gives me the cable.
/endofrant
Post your stories.

item.title: Incompetence
item.dc:creator: @runescape3dude runescape3dude
item.description:
@runescape3dude wrote:

[quote=“goatee, post:23, topic:308566”][quote author=runescape3dude link=topic=404993.msg2996480#msg2996480 date=1255639941]
I have another rant now. Last night I finally moved all my shit to my dads, arranged to be picked up by a school friend on the way to school in mornings. He forgets to get me on way. I now have to find a way to get 30km to school up hill on a pushbike.
[/quote]

I really hope you just took the day off.[/quote]
School actually ended up being quite good once I got a ride from my stepdad. I owned up at pool (snooker, 8-ball, etc) and my tech teacher made me the welding instructor.

Read full topic

item.title: Incompetence
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

[quote=“lesterknome, post:20, topic:308566”][quote author=PeterMan link=topic=404993.msg2995152#msg2995152 date=1255543189]
Well, about 2 weeks ago I sent my 22" inch computer monitor to service because it suddenly bursted into flames and started smoking the shit out of my room.
[/quote]

I lold.

Today in the library, I spent 20 mins writing my homework, pressed the print button, payed $0.07 and closed the window without saving, expecting it to print. I then walked to the printer to notice that it did not print and I wasted time and money. Later that day I got a detention for not doing my homework and having no proof that I even attempted to do it.

Once when I was working front desk at my university’s technical support, a guy came in with a freaking floppy disk he apparently saved his final senior thesis on which was supposedly 50+ pages and the only place he saved it was this floppy (idiot!!!) Well now when put into a computer the floppy said it was ‘not formatted’ (ie, you are completely screwed) I ended up googling for some program to recover files from corrupt floppies, and on the 3rd try it worked, the guy threatened to come around the counter and kiss me, I declined

Bottom line, it’s a bad idea to save anything important in only one place, it’s beyond a bad idea if this place is a floppy disk.

I still have a floppy disk drive on this computer that has 30 gb hard drive with 256 mb of ram. I’m not sure how it turns on but it somehow does.[/quote]
PC’s used to run on < 1 mb of RAM you know, so 256mb isn’t that surprising.

Read full topic

I then walked to the printer to notice that it did not print and I wasted time and money. Later that day I got a detention for not doing my homework and having no proof that I even attempted to do it.
[/quote]

Once when I was working front desk at my university’s technical support, a guy came in with a freaking floppy disk he apparently saved his final senior thesis on which was supposedly 50+ pages and the only place he saved it was this floppy (idiot!!!) Well now when put into a computer the floppy said it was ‘not formatted’ (ie, you are completely screwed) I ended up googling for some program to recover files from corrupt floppies, and on the 3rd try it worked, the guy threatened to come around the counter and kiss me, I declined

Bottom line, it’s a bad idea to save anything important in only one place, it’s beyond a bad idea if this place is a floppy disk. :P[/quote]

I still have a floppy disk drive on this computer that has 30 gb hard drive with 256 mb of ram. I’m not sure how it turns on but it somehow does.

Read full topic

item.title: Incompetence
item.dc:creator: @bootnecklad bootnecklad
item.description:
@bootnecklad wrote:

2 weeks ago I was this VGA cable for this 22" computer monitor and then this kid comes up and starts to burn the monitor! Im like wtf! who am I going to give electrons to now! So the kids puts me, audio cable and monitor in a box and takes us to this shop. he goes nutty and expecting it to be serviced! There’s this guy at the shop who knows it cant be fixed. Me, the audio cable and the box say our goodbyes to the monitor who was being sent away then the dude at the shop throws us under the counter. The kid comes back about two weeks later ranting that he hasn’t had any calls for the monitor, duuhh you fucked it over! The dude at the shop picks me up a new monitor and puts us in the box, he forgets my beloved audio cable! The kid takes me and the new monitor home (we get along well) and plugs me in, he gets pissy because the dude at the shop “forgot” to but audio cable in the box, i didn’t see him for ages, he came back plugged audio cable in and then i get all these electrons saying “hey we are gay scat porn” so I think im going to break my self, I feel sorry for audio cable!

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

2 weeks ago I was this 22" computer monitor. I hate my life, my owner makes me display gay scat porn constantly. So I decided to end my life. I managed to catch fire! It hurt a lot, but my homosexual owner took me back to the shop to be serviced. The guy who took me said I’d be good as new in a few days, but instead he chucked me into the trash and now I live on an island of garbage, paradise.

Read full topic

item.title: Incompetence
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

[quote=“Mopman, post:2, topic:308566”]2 weeks ago this customer came into my store with a 22’ monitor that had CAUGHT FIRE assuming it could be serviced instead of replaced. I told him I’d have it ready in a few days, but chucked it away and got a new one out, cuz uh… it had CAUGHT FIRE.

He still assumed it was being serviced, so I fobbed him off for a bit. Then eventually he realised his mistake so I gave him a new one.

He was pissing me off so I left the cables out so he had to come back.[/quote]

I bet this is something a lot of store employees do.

Read full topic
